title: Can a players PBE application get lost/forgotten?
body: Hello, so I've put in my pbe application almost 3 years ago. I haven't been banned or toxic in those 3 years. I'm frequently reporting bugs and taking surveys. The closest thing to a ban is when the new client crashes in champ select and I have to wait 5 mins. Now there has been 3 champs that I've played ALOT of Taric, Aatrox, and Brand, yet they all have been in the PBE and I thought you accept people that play a lot of a champ that's being reworked? If Galio (my main) goes into the PBE and I still hear nothing then I'll take it as a yes.

replies.body: An application isn't lost or forgotten.  You can[ check your application ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)at any time by going to the application link while logged into your account.   I know you've waited a bit, but we can't force or expedite applications.  Best of luck, though, with getting accepted!
